AUG 14 1962
General Services Administration/PES Region 5 Washington 25, b.C. ٨٠ ٥٠ ٧٠
Subject: Excess Property
Gentlemen, We have a requirement for one Menel Ingine, Catalog No. 6, Tage 9, Control No. 563-0182, Item 1, Condition 0-2. Please advise availability. If your reply is in the affirmative we will immediately forward our purchase order. Sincerely yours,
H. 2. Potter Supply Advisor

15957 V.O.
S G.
